CustomField.description: Represents when the last approved Terms & Conditions document was published in the Community. If a User accepted their T&C before this date, they will be required to review and accept the Terms and Conditions again.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Represents when the last approved Terms & Conditions document was published in the Community. If a User accepted their T&C before this date, they will be required to review and accept the Terms and Conditions again.
CustomField.label: T&C Published Current Date
